news_header: Millions celebrate the Lunar New Year, marking a fresh start with festivities lasting about 15 days.
news_text: The Lunar New Year, coinciding with the first new moon of the lunar calendar, is celebrated by millions across Asia and worldwide. It is considered the most important event of the year for many, symbolizing a fresh start. Celebrations include fireworks, music, fairs, lanterns, and traditional dragon and lion dances, lasting approximately 15 days.
